In a post on Google's corporate blog, Eric Schmidt explains that he accomplished more than what he set out to do in an explanation for his decision: When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process. And our emerging businesses-display, Android, YouTube and Chrome-are on fire. Of course, like any successful organization we've had our fair share of good luck, but the entire team-now over 24,000 Googlers globally-deserves most of the credit. outlook is bright. Chrysler emerge from bankruptcy in June 2009 and form a partnership with Fiat SpA. Advertisement That will be an accomplishment for an automaker many thought would not survive, even with bailouts. The fact that Chrysler will have positive operating profit and a positive cash flow makes them more of a comeback kid than Ford( Motor Co.) is, said Warren Browne, vice president of business development for AutomotiveCompass LLC in Northville. Sergio Marchionne , The CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, has said operating profit for 2010 will be about$ 700 million. Sergio Marchionne

NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said. "He's been in tremendous agony." Allen Iverson spent 10 seasons in Philadelphia before bouncing through Denver and Detroit, ending up in Memphis last season.
